Subscription.Description: Events for application crashes, hangs & WER reports
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Application"> <!-- Application crashes --> <Select Path="Application"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Application Error'] and Level=2 and EventID=1000]] </Select>
<!-- Application hangs --> <Select Path="Application"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Application Hang'] and Level=2 and EventID=1002]] </Select>
<!-- WER reports --> <Select Path="Application"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Windows Error Reporting'] and Level=4 and EventID=1001]] </Select> </Query> </QueryList>
